name: Alex
tuning: Prefers moderate complexity and balanced information. Interested in trends and long-term changes but not overly technical. Ideal for general comparisons or historical data.

name: Bob
tuning: Seeks straightforward, simple insights. Focused on confirming general patterns without requiring detailed analysis. Ideal for surface-level discussions.

name: Oscar
tuning: Curious and detail-oriented, prefers data linked to specific observations or events. Focused on correlating phenomena like air pollution and ecological impacts.
